xtcc_set * r_data

Detailed Description

range_question range questions in the qscript language become object instantiations of this class.

Below is an example of a range question - the allowed codes are hard coded numbers -> (1,2,5-8) q2 "Q2. This is question 2" mp (5) int32_t (1,2,5-8);

Member Function Documentation

void range_question::generate_code ( ostringstream &  quest_defns,
ostringstream &  program_code 
) [virtual]

generate_code(): Pure virtual functions takes 2 streams which as parameters code is written to both the streams the code in the quest_defns stream appears before the code in the program_code stream

Implements question.
